metadata.title: CVE-2018-5295 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there is an integer overflow in thePdfXRefStreamParserObject::ParseStream function(base/PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp). Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.5-9
libpodofo0.9.6 - 0.9.5-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-9').
